lead_paragraph: FIFA has cut off funding to the corruption-hit confederations for soccer in the Americas, the global football body said on Monday, in a move which could cause future cash flow problems for the two organizations.

headline.print_headline: FIFA Cuts Off Funding to Scandal-Hit Americas Confederations
headline.main: FIFA Cuts Off Funding to Scandal-Hit Americas Confederations
